```{r, include=FALSE}
library(broom)
library(cowplot)
library(magrittr)
library(qiime2R)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(rstatix)
```

**Input File Path**

```{r}
survival_fp <- '../data/misc/aim1a_survival.csv'
```

**Reading in Mouse Survival Data**

col_types tells R what to classify the data in each column as

```{r}
survival <- read_csv(survival_fp,
                     col_types = cols(Day = col_integer(),
                                      status = col_integer(), 
                                      diet = col_character(),
                                      group = col_integer()))

```
